SimpleCount

Class MyAmazingLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimpleCount.MyAmazingLayoutController

  • public class MyAmazingLayoutController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main controller for the JavaFX fxml view. It handles every action performed by the program

    • Method Detail

      • handleNumber

        protected void handleNumber(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is an handler bond to numbers (0 - 9) It appends the digit to the current displayed number
        Parameters:
        event - an event to access the source button

      • backspaceHandler

        protected void backspaceHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the backspace button It removes the last digit of the current number. If there is only one digit left it sets the current number to 0

      • dotHandler

        protected void dotHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is an handler bond to the dot button. It appends a dot to the current displayed number. Only work if no occurrence of a number has been found.
        Parameters:
        event - an event to access the source button

      • operatorHandler

        protected void operatorHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is an handler bond to every operator's buttons. It solves the current mathematical expression to display the result and append the pressed operator button to it.
        Parameters:
        event - an event to access the source button

      • equalHandler

        protected void equalHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the equal button. It solve the entire expression and displays the result.

      • clearEntireHandler

        protected void clearEntireHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the C button. It clears both the current result and the whole expression.

      • clearCurrentHandler

        protected void clearCurrentHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the CE button. It clears the current result.

      • reciprocalHandler

        protected void reciprocalHandler()

      • scientificOperatorHandler

        protected void scientificOperatorHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      • storeHandler

        protected void storeHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the MS button. It stores the current display into the memory in a String variable called \"_stored\" and sets the bottom-right label to \"M\".

      • recallHandler

        protected void recallHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the MR button. It sets the current display to the value of the memory.

      • cleanMemoryHandler

        protected void cleanMemoryHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the MR button. It clears the number stored in the memory and sets the bottom-right label to \"NoMem\".

      • memoryAddHandler

        protected void memoryAddHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the MR button. It adds the current display to the number stored in the memory.

      • memorySubHandler

        protected void memorySubHandler()
        This method is an handler bond to the MR button. It subtracts the current display to the number stored in the memory.

      • calculateExpression

        public java.math.BigDecimal calculateExpression(java.lang.String calc)
                                         throws com.udojava.evalex.Expression.ExpressionException
        Solve an expression given as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        calc - mathematical expression to solve
        Returns:
        BigDecimal
        Throws:
        com.udojava.evalex.Expression.ExpressionException
        See Also:
        Expression.ExpressionException
